abstract.t: This document describes an approach to to use Hypertext Transfer Protocol (HTTP) over Transport Layer Protocol (TLS) to transport Presence Information Data Format Location Objects (PIDF-LO) (see RFC 4119). It is a GEOPRIV using protocol as described in Section 5.2 or RFC 3693 to resolve an identifier, which denotes a reference, to a PIDF-LO. The document assumes that the HTTP client possesses the reference that is obtained using a mechanism that are outside the scope of this document and conveys it to the HTTP server in order to retrieve a PIDF-LO in a response.
